languages.text: "Шерин! Даргонус прекрасен в это время года, не находите?" {n}Джай приветствует вас знакомой жемчужной улыбкой.{/n} "Кстати... Мы здесь уже три цикла разбираем последствия ксеновторжения и прочее... И Великий упаси делать какие-то намеки... но церемония вашего патентонаследия уже давно прошла".

traits.locale_text: "Шерин! Даргонус прекрасен в это время года, не находите?" {n}Джай приветствует вас знакомой жемчужной улыбкой.{/n} "Кстати... Мы здесь уже три цикла разбираем последствия ксеновторжения и прочее... И Великий упаси делать какие-то намеки... но церемония вашего патентонаследия уже давно прошла".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen! Dargonus is absolutely fabulous this season, wouldn't you agree?" {n}Jae greets you with a familiar pearly smile.{/n} "Incidentally... We've been dealing with the aftermath of the xeno-invasion for three cycles now... And far be it from me to hint at anything... but the ceremony of your succession has long since passed."

languages.text: « Shereen ! Dargonus est absolument magnifique en cette saison, vous ne trouvez pas ? {n}s'exclame Jae en vous adressant son sourire franc habituel.{/n} Par ailleurs... Cela fait maintenant trois cycles que nous gérons les conséquences de l'invasion xénos... Et loin de moi l'idée d'insinuer quoi que ce soit, mais... votre cérémonie d'accession est passée depuis longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "Shereen! Dargonus is absolutely fabulous this season, wouldn't you agree?" {n}Jae greets you with a familiar pearly smile.{/n} "Incidentally... We've been dealing with the aftermath of the xeno-invasion for three cycles now... And far be it from me to hint at anything... but the ceremony of your succession has long since passed."

traits.locale_text: « Shereen ! Dargonus est absolument magnifique en cette saison, vous ne trouvez pas ? {n}s'exclame Jae en vous adressant son sourire franc habituel.{/n} Par ailleurs... Cela fait maintenant trois cycles que nous gérons les conséquences de l'invasion xénos... Et loin de moi l'idée d'insinuer quoi que ce soit, mais... votre cérémonie d'accession est passée depuis longtemps. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的！这个季节的达戈努斯实在是太美了，你说是吧？”{n}婕伊带着你熟悉的灿烂笑容，想你打了个招呼。{/n}“顺便一提……异形入侵已经是三个周期之前的事情了……我并不打算暗示什么事情……不过您的继任颂典也早就结束了。”
languages.original_text: "Shereen! Dargonus is absolutely fabulous this season, wouldn't you agree?" {n}Jae greets you with a familiar pearly smile.{/n} "Incidentally... We've been dealing with the aftermath of the xeno-invasion for three cycles now... And far be it from me to hint at anything... but the ceremony of your succession has long since passed."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的！这个季节的达戈努斯实在是太美了，你说是吧？”{n}婕伊带着你熟悉的灿烂笑容，想你打了个招呼。{/n}“顺便一提……异形入侵已经是三个周期之前的事情了……我并不打算暗示什么事情……不过您的继任颂典也早就结束了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シャリーン！この時期のダルゴナスはマジで最高だな。アンタもそう思わないか？」{n}ジェイが、いつもの真珠のように輝く笑顔で挨拶してきた。{/n}「ちなみに…あたしたちはもう3周期も異種族の侵略の余波に対処してる。それとこんなことを言うつもりはないんだけど…アンタの継承式はとっくに終わってるよ」
languages.original_text: "Shereen! Dargonus is absolutely fabulous this season, wouldn't you agree?" {n}Jae greets you with a familiar pearly smile.{/n} "Incidentally... We've been dealing with the aftermath of the xeno-invasion for three cycles now... And far be it from me to hint at anything... but the ceremony of your succession has long since passed."

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン！この時期のダルゴナスはマジで最高だな。アンタもそう思わないか？」{n}ジェイが、いつもの真珠のように輝く笑顔で挨拶してきた。{/n}「ちなみに…あたしたちはもう3周期も異種族の侵略の余波に対処してる。それとこんなことを言うつもりはないんだけど…アンタの継承式はとっくに終わってるよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen! Dargonus ist zu dieser Zeit absolut fabelhaft, meint Ihr nicht auch?" {n}Jae grüßt dich mit einem vertrauten strahlenden Lächeln.{/n} "Übrigens ... Wir beschäftigen uns nun schon seit drei Zyklen mit den Folgen der Xenos-Invasion ... Und nichts liegt mir ferner, als irgendwelche Andeutungen zu machen ... aber die Zeremonie Eurer Nachfolge ist schon längst vergangen."
languages.original_text: "Shereen! Dargonus is absolutely fabulous this season, wouldn't you agree?" {n}Jae greets you with a familiar pearly smile.{/n} "Incidentally... We've been dealing with the aftermath of the xeno-invasion for three cycles now... And far be it from me to hint at anything... but the ceremony of your succession has long since passed."

traits.locale_text: "Shereen! Dargonus ist zu dieser Zeit absolut fabelhaft, meint Ihr nicht auch?" {n}Jae grüßt dich mit einem vertrauten strahlenden Lächeln.{/n} "Übrigens ... Wir beschäftigen uns nun schon seit drei Zyklen mit den Folgen der Xenos-Invasion ... Und nichts liegt mir ferner, als irgendwelche Andeutungen zu machen ... aber die Zeremonie Eurer Nachfolge ist schon längst vergangen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Shereen! Dargonus está absolutamente fabulosa en esta época del año, ¿no cree?». {n}Jae te saluda con su familiar sonrisa de dientes como perlas.{/n} «Por cierto... Ya llevamos tres ciclos lidiando con las repercusiones de la invasión xenos... No quisiera propasarme ni nada parecido... pero hace ya mucho que terminó su ceremonia de sucesión».
languages.original_text: "Shereen! Dargonus is absolutely fabulous this season, wouldn't you agree?" {n}Jae greets you with a familiar pearly smile.{/n} "Incidentally... We've been dealing with the aftermath of the xeno-invasion for three cycles now... And far be it from me to hint at anything... but the ceremony of your succession has long since passed."

traits.locale_text: «¡Shereen! Dargonus está absolutamente fabulosa en esta época del año, ¿no cree?». {n}Jae te saluda con su familiar sonrisa de dientes como perlas.{/n} «Por cierto... Ya llevamos tres ciclos lidiando con las repercusiones de la invasión xenos... No quisiera propasarme ni nada parecido... pero hace ya mucho que terminó su ceremonia de sucesión».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim! Dargonus bu mevsimde kesinlikle harikulade, sence de öyle değil mi?" {n}Jae seni inciyi andıran o tanıdık gülümsemesiyle karşılıyor.{/n} "Ben de tam üç döngüdür zeno istilasının kalıntılarıyla uğraşıyordum. Bir şey ima etmek bana düşmez tabii ama makamına kavuştuğun törenin üzerinden de çok zaman geçti."
languages.original_text: "Shereen! Dargonus is absolutely fabulous this season, wouldn't you agree?" {n}Jae greets you with a familiar pearly smile.{/n} "Incidentally... We've been dealing with the aftermath of the xeno-invasion for three cycles now... And far be it from me to hint at anything... but the ceremony of your succession has long since passed."

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim! Dargonus bu mevsimde kesinlikle harikulade, sence de öyle değil mi?" {n}Jae seni o inciyi andıran tanıdık gülümsemesiyle karşılıyor.{/n} "Ben de tam üç döngüdür zeno istilasının kalıntılarıyla uğraşıyordum. Bir şey ima etmek bana düşmez tabii ama yeni mevkini elde ettiğin seremoninin üzerinden de çok zaman geçti."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
